verses.roman:
ebe bhaya gela, tomāra mana haila sthire
kāhāṅ tāṅre uṭhāñācha, dekhāha āmāre"

synonyms: ebe—now; bhaya—fear; gela—has gone; tomāra—your; mana—mind; haila—has become; sthire—pacified; kāhāṅ—where; tāṅre—Him; uṭhāñācha—have you lifted; dekhāha—please show; āmāre—me.
translation: "Now that your fear has gone and your mind is peaceful, please show me where He is."
